page.title: 05POLLUTION IN OUR AREA
page.content: In the{Horrabridge}area we don't get much pollution because we're not an urban area.We don't get acid rain because the predominant wind blows from the sea.We don't have badly polluted air because all of our power comes from a{Hydro-Electric Power {Station}in{Mary Tavy}.You can't drink the water from the river{Walkham because some people throw rubbish into it and they go swimming in it.The only {chemicals}we use in{Horrabridge}are used by farmers but if they're blown away they cause a lot of damage.Most of our pollution comes from {litter}.Quite a lot collects in{Wier {Park}and up our school hill.It ranges from paper bags,to tin cans,crisp packets and sweet wrappers.
